mapper.sql: USER_ID, RUN_UUID, MISSION_ID, MISSION_TYPE_ID, MISSION_ROUTE, MISSION_START_TIME, MISSION_END_TIME, MISSION_DATE, SPEND_CARLORIE, STEPS, DURATION, AVG_SPEED, DISTANCE, MISSION_GRADE, HEALTH, FATNESS, GOLD_COIN, EXTRA_GOLD_COIN, EXPERIENCE, EXTRA_EXPERIENCE, COMMENT, VALID, MISSION_UUID, SEQUENCE, PROP_GET, ACTION_IDS, COMMIT_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_RUNNING_HISTORY ( USER_ID, RUN_UUID, MISSION_ID, MISSION_TYPE_ID, MISSION_ROUTE, MISSION_START_TIME, MISSION_END_TIME, MISSION_DATE, SPEND_CARLORIE, STEPS, DURATION, AVG_SPEED, DISTANCE, MISSION_GRADE, HEALTH, FATNESS, GOLD_COIN, EXTRA_GOLD_COIN, EXPERIENCE, EXTRA_EXPERIENCE, COMMENT, VALID, MISSION_UUID, SEQUENCE, PROP_GET, ACTION_IDS, COMMIT_TIME ) VALUES ( #{entity.userId}, #{entity.runUuid}, #{entity.missionId}, #{entity.missionTypeId}, #{entity.missionRoute}, #{entity.missionStartTime}, #{entity.missionEndTime}, #{entity.missionDate}, #{entity.spendCarlorie}, #{entity.steps}, #{entity.duration}, #{entity.avgSpeed}, #{entity.distance}, #{entity.missionGrade}, #{entity.health}, #{entity.fatness}, #{entity.goldCoin}, #{entity.extraGoldCoin}, #{entity.experience}, #{entity.extraExperience}, #{entity.comment}, #{entity.valid}, #{entity.missionUuid}, #{entity.sequence}, #{entity.propGet}, #{entity.actionIds}, now() )
mapper.sql: USER_ID, SPEND_CARLORIE, STEPS, DURATION, AVG_SPEED, DISTANCE, MISSION_GRADE, PROP_GET, MISSION_END_TIME
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM USER_RUNNING_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY MISSION_END_TIME DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.sql: MISSION_UUID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, MISSION_ID, MISSION_TYPE_ID, MISSION_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, MISSION_STATUS, MISSION_STATUS_COMMENT, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MISSION_HISTORY ( MISSION_UUID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, MISSION_ID, MISSION_TYPE_ID, MISSION_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, MISSION_STATUS, MISSION_STATUS_COMMENT, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{entity.missionUuid}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.missionId}, #{entity.missionTypeId}, #{entity.missionName}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.missionStatus}, #{entity.missionStatusComment}, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MISSION_STATUS = #{entity.missionStatus}, MISSION_STATUS_COMMENT = #{entity.missionStatusComment}, UPDATE_TIME = now();
